ygData.subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back
ygData.msgSnippet: While resting as he was being tended to, Tucson forgets about the pain he is suffering as Talon stays beside him the entire time. He was very curious about

While resting as he was being tended to, Tucson forgets about the pain he i=
s suffering as Talon stays beside him the entire time. He was very curious =
about Talon.  She stayed by his side the entire time they were down on that=
 base, and she showed great concern when he locked himself up with Lamia an=
d Nightstrike.  She was even putting up with his antics which to many, was =
plain wrecklessness.   

" Talon, you're - still with me.  I - don't think =
other femme bots would - be able to put up with my unpredictable behavior l=
ike you have.  Don't - be alarmed, I've gotten to know you but, if - you do=
n't mind, since I can't see you, I - need my hands to - do that for me."  
=

With one hand, Tucson gently feels Talon's face with a tenderness he had n=
ot expressed since meeting her and the others.  He smiles and now gets an i=
dea of what she may look like.  Afterwards, he gently covers her hand with =
his own.

" I - wish I could see you.  My hands - tell me there's a - beaut=
iful Maximal standing beside me, and I'd - really hate to miss it."  



--=

dn't hear Lamia sneak up on me, nor did my sonar senses catch on. I - think=

save Nightstrike for me, I'll be sure he gives us a full work up as to what=

tay in his face until he does. No way in Primus's name I'm letting him get =
away with anything."
